com.hybris.services.entitlements.atdd.keywords

Class EntitlementsExecuteKeywordLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.services.entitlements.atdd.keywords.AbstractEntitlementsKeywordLibrary
      • com.hybris.services.entitlements.atdd.keywords.EntitlementsExecuteKeywordLibrary

  • @Configurable
public class EntitlementsExecuteKeywordLibrary
extends AbstractEntitlementsKeywordLibrary
    Grant execution ATDD keywords.

        execution result
